Here are 25 famous ladies who will be having an extra-special Sunday!

Janet Jackson, Peta Murgatroyd and Irina Shayk are just a handful of celebrity moms that will be celebrating their first Mother's Day with their bundles of joy on May 14. These first-time mommies will no doubt be smothered with gifts and well wishes from their friends and families.

Janet Jackson, Peta Murgatroyd and Irina Shayk are just a handful of celebrity moms that will be celebrating their first Mother's Day with their bundles of joy on May 14. These first-time mommies will no doubt be smothered with gifts and well wishes from their friends and families.

Here are 25 famous ladies who will be having an extra-special Sunday!

1. Janet Jackson

The pop icon gave birth to her first child, son Eissa Al Mana, with now-ex Wissam Al Mana on January 3. Jackson shared the first picture of her precious babe last month and he couldn't be any cuter. My baby and me after nap time. A post shared by Janet Jackson (@janetjackson) on Apr 14, 2017 at 6:17pm PDT 2. Amanda Seyfried

The Mean Girls actress and husband Thomas Sadoski welcomed their first child, a baby girl, in March. Since her birth, the couple has kept their little one hidden from the limelight.

3. Hoda Kotb

This year, the Today show co-host adopted a daughter, Haley Joy ��� who was born on Valentine's Day. After her battle with cancer left her unable to conceive, Kotb decided to move forward with the adoption and bring home the little one who changed her life forever. My girl �������������� A post shared by Hoda Kotb (@hodakotb) on Apr 18, 2017 at 10:45am PDT

4. Irina Shayk

The 31 year-old model and Bradley Cooper's much-awaited first baby, daughter Lea De Seine Shayk Cooper, was born March 21. The couple, who have been dating for two years, have since kept their little girl hidden from public view.

5. Peta Murgatroyd

The Dancing With the Stars pro and her co-star and fiance, Maksim Chmerkovskiy, became parents to son Shai Aleksander on January 4, 2017. The baby's name means "gift" in Hebrew. BOO ���� A post shared by Peta Murgatroyd (@petamurgatroyd) on Mar 26, 2017 at 8:58am PDT 6. Ali Fedotowsky

The former Bachelorette is celebrating her first Mother's Day with husband Kevin Manno. The couple welcomed their daughter, Molly Sullivan Manno, on July 6, 2016. Last time I blogged about Molly's sleep training I receive SO many comments and emails from other moms saying that my post helped them and their baby sleep!!! That makes my ������ so happy! I also got a lot of questions. So today on the blog I'm updating all of you on how @mollymanno is sleeping 2 weeks after sleep training. I'm answering questions about her schedule, my milk supply and if she's still sleeping through the night - www.AliLuvs.com #clicklinkinbio ���� by @ashleyburns_ A post shared by Ali Fedotowsky-Manno (@alifedotowsky) on May 1, 2017 at 10:18am PDT

7. Audrina Patridge

The 32-year-old former Hills star became a mom on June 24, 2016, when she gave birth to daughter Kirra Max Bohan with husband Corey Bohan. Patridge loves to show off her mini-me on social media. ������ A post shared by Audrina Patridge-Bohan (@audrinapatridge) on Apr 16, 2017 at 5:12pm PDT 8. Meghan King Edmonds

The Real Housewives of Orange County star and her husband, Jim Edmonds, welcomed their first child, a baby girl named Aspen King Edmonds on November 24, Thanksgiving Day. Fiesta! A post shared by Meghan King Edmonds (@meghankedmonds) on Apr 29, 2017 at 6:43pm PDT

9. Cheryl Cole

The singer became a first time mommy on March 22, giving birth to son Bear. Cole celebrated her first UK Mother's Day on March 26 by sharing a photo of boyfriend, Liam Payne, holding their son and writing, "Happy Mother's Day to all the mothers around the world. A day that now has a different meaning to me forever." On Wednesday 22nd March Liam and I became parents to an incredibly beautiful, healthy baby boy, weighing 7lb 9 and looking like a dream. Although he still doesn't have a name he is already stealing hearts. We are all madly in love and overwhelmingly happy with our little arrival. Happy Mother's Day to all the mothers around the world. A day that now has a different meaning to me forever ���� A post shared by Cheryl (@cherylofficial) on Mar 25, 2017 at 1:25pm PDT 10. Amber Tamblyn

The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants actress gave birth to her first child, a baby girl named Marlow, with husband David Cross in February of this year. The couple announced their daughter's arrival with a cute video of the baby's foot wriggling around on Instagram. Baby's first cabbage A post shared by David Cross (@davidcrossofficial) on Mar 12, 2017 at 4:28pm PDT

11. Jena Malone

The Hunger Games actress was a couple weeks shy of celebrating her first Mother's Day last year. Malone and fianc�� Ethan DeLorenzo welcomed her first child, a boy named Ode Mountain DeLorenzo, in late May 2016. The best weekend of our lives!!! What an incredible blessing to be chosen by this amazing , kind , gentle and beautiful soul to be his parents. Humbled and in complete awe that we get to experience the most ancient and transcendent love that exists. Thank you Ode Mountain DeLorenzo Malone. A post shared by Jena Malone (@jenamalone) on May 31, 2016 at 9:26am PDT 12. Ellie Kemper

The Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt actress and husband Michael Koman welcomed their son, James Miller Koman, in August 2016. Since he arrived, Kemper says that becoming a mother has changed her life "in a good way."

13. Alexa PenaVega

The Spy Kids actress' life changed when she welcomed her first child, a son named Ocean King, with husband Carlos PenaVega on November 28. The couple love to spoil their fans with adorable snapshots of their little one. Saturday giggles ������������ A post shared by Alexa PenaVega (@vegaalexa) on May 6, 2017 at 5:29pm PDT

14. Bar Refaeli

The 31-year-old model gave birth to her first child, daughter Liv, with husband Adi Ezra on August 11, 2016. In March, Refaeli announced on social media that she is pregnant with her second baby. Great expectations .. �������� A post shared by Bar Refaeli (@barrefaeli) on Jun 26, 2016 at 10:27am PDT 15. Candice Swanepoel

The Victoria's Secret model and fianc�� Hermann Nicoli welcomed their first child, a baby boy named Anac��, on October 5, 2016. Since he joined mommy and daddy, the toddler has made many appearances on Swanepoel's Instagram page. ���������������� A post shared by Candice Swanepoel (@angelcandices) on Feb 17, 2017 at 12:43pm PST

16. Erika Christensen

The Parenthood actress became a first-time mom on June 21, 2016, welcoming daughter Shane Maness with husband Cole Maness at their home in California. Wish there was a flamingo emoji for this guy in the background. Marshmallow and I had to take a pic with at least one of the many super fun wallpapers in @sophiabanksc's house! A post shared by Erika Christensen (@erikachristensen) on Feb 19, 2017 at 9:36pm PST 17. Camilla Luddington

The Grey's Anatomy star announced the birth of her baby girl, Hayden, with actor Matthew Alan last month on Instagram. "We have a new great love in our lives," she captioned her photo. We have a new great love in our lives... our sweet baby girl...Hayden ���������������������������������������� A post shared by Camilla Luddington (@camillaluddington) on Apr 11, 2017 at 10:07am PDT

18. Jurnee Smollett-Bell

The 30-year-old Underground actress was blessed with her first child, a baby boy named Hunter Zion Bell, with husband Josiah Bell on October 31, 2016. The mother and son currently star in Gap's "Mama Said" campaign. Saturday kind of joy ���� A post shared by Jurnee Smollett Bell (@jurneebell) on Apr 15, 2017 at 5:29pm PDT 19. Lily Rabe

The American Horror Story actress and boyfriend Hamish Linklater welcomed their first baby, a daughter, together in March. As of now, the little girl's name is unknown. Happy International Women's Day. Today. Tomorrow. Every day. Girls are magic. ������������ #internationalwomensday #weshouldallbefeminists #thefutureisFEMALE A post shared by Lily Rabe (@pillypie22) on Mar 8, 2017 at 9:48pm PST

20. Felicia Day

The 37-year-old actress announced the arrival of her baby girl, Calliope Maeve, on January 30, 2016 with an adorable Instagram photo of her daughter's little toes. Finally feeling like myself. I combed my hair and everything! (Combed Calliope's too) A post shared by Felicia Day (@feliciaday) on Mar 6, 2017 at 3:57pm PST 21. Alexandra Breckenridge

On September 3, 2016, the This Is Us actress and her husband, Casey Neil Hooper, welcomed their first child, a boy named Jack Breckenridge Hooper. The new mom is totally enamored with her little one, as you can see in the pic below. My ������ A post shared by @alexandrabreck on Apr 30, 2017 at 8:00am PDT

22. Tatyana Ali

The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air star and her husband, Dr. Vaughn Rasberry, became parents to a son, Edward Aszard Rasberry, on September 16, 2016, a couple months after they tied the knot. Acting is a career that affords some really exceptional pleasures #mommyandme #setlife #workingmom A post shared by Tatyana Ali (@tatyanaali) on Mar 7, 2017 at 8:40pm PST 23. Jayma Mays

The Glee star became a mom on August 21, 2016, when she welcomed son Jude Jones with husband Adam Campbell. The couple met in 2006 on the set of Epic Movie and got married the following year.

24. Lacey Chabert

On September 1, 2016, the Mean Girls star welcomed her first child, a girl named Julia Mimi, with husband David Nehdar. The actress called her baby's birth "the best day" of her life. Wheeeee! #sundayfunday with the fam! ��������������������������� A few asked in the comments about my bag, it's @jujube_intl love their bags A post shared by Lacey Chabert (@thereallacey) on Apr 23, 2017 at 1:59pm PDT
